data.title: Weather at Zurich Airport (ZRH): Weather and Climate in Zurich Area, Switzerland
meta_keywords: zurich features temperate climate long been one switzerlands favourite cities city found point where limmat river splits lake zurich large areas verdant hilly countryside nearby
data.meta_description: Zurich features a temperate climate and has long been one of Switzerland's favourite cities.  The city can be found at the point where the Limmat River splits from Lake Zurich, with large areas of verdant and hilly countryside nearby.
